alert.note: Alert for Umatilla (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 30 at 11:59AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by upstream dam release release continues. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Oregon, including the following county, Umatilla. * WHEN...Until 130 PM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of low lying areas along McKay Creek downstream of the dam is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1150 AM PDT, Continued flooding of low lying areas due to an upstream floodgate release is expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Pendleton. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
